Kate Somerville Wrinkle Warrior Eye (2018 formulation)

Brand: Kate Somerville

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Propanediol, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Acrylates Copolymer, Glycerin, Saccharomyces Cerevisiae Extract, Medicago Sativa (Alfalfa) Seed Extract, Hydrolyzed Lupine Protein, Plankton Extract, Hy

Plankton Extract, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Methylglucoside Phosphate, Copper Lysinate/Prolinate, Disodium Acetyl Glucosamine Phosphate, Chondrus Crispus Extract, Adenosine, 1,2-Hexanediol, Sodium Polyacrylate Starch, Lecithin, PEG-12 Dimethicone, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Sodium

exylglycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Gluconolacctone

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
